# Simple Example

I have created a simple example dataset and calculated the sample mean. 
```{r}
somedata = c(10, 23, 14, 12, 34, 26, 28)
mean(somedata)
```

Here is a boxplot of the data
```{r, echo = FALSE}
boxplot(somedata)
```
